name: Mezdek
main: I am in love with human cultures and primarily their languages. I want to learn everything I can about humans, analyse their ways of living and understand them and try to find solutions to their problems, and I find programming is one magical way to do most of that.
secondary: I come from Mesopotamia, the region where the first writing codes have seen light, and I have been living in Germany since 2016 after fleeing a bloody war in Syria.
